title: Yanping Weng
text:
yanping.weng@outlook.com
  
  
    
     yan-ww
  
  
    
     Yanping Weng
  

  
  
Hello!
I am pursuing a Phd position in bioinformatics.
In a previous role, I worked at the Faculty of Medicine, University of Oslo. Iâ€™m mostly interested in RWD (real-world data), such as hospital Electronic Health Record and large public health registry data. I develop ggehr, a ggplot2 extension to visualizing EHR data.
In 2020-2022, I worked as part of the COVID emergency response at the Norwegian Institute of Public Health. I helped develop the open source real-time analysis and public health surveillance system, Sykdomspulsen (now CSIDS). I am co-leading CAMIS working group.
As a part-time lecturer, I teach statistics with R and Quarto at Oslo Centre for Biostatistics and Epidemiology (OCBE) and R programming at the Carpentries workshops at UiO.
I enjoy cooking and spending time in the mountains.
